description: Massive simplification: Adopted Julie's direct TOON pattern. Deleted ~250 lines of complex hierarchical flattening code (hierarchical_toon.py, encode_hierarchical_toon, TracePathFlattener). Replaced with simple 70-line toon_utils.py helper. All 27 TOON tests pass. Key insight: TOON handles nesting natively - no need for complex flattening. Simpler is better!
